title: Sentinels
description: ORDER is born from the light of the old world and must protect the emerging new world from the wrath of chaos. From order, the SENTINELS are brought forth to act as guardians, and from these eternal beings, comes the ONE TRUE CHILD.  Carling, raised as one of The People, is destined to be the sword of Order and to defeat Chaos. Failure means the destruction of her world. Carling cannot fail.
author: L.C. Conn
